bibl.title: Philip Freeman and David Kennedy (Edd.), The Defence of the Roman and Byzantine East. Proceedings of a Colloquium held at the University of Sheffield in April 1986. Part i
bibl.note: Devijver Hubert, Equestrian Officers from the East.

Philip Freeman and David Kennedy (Edd.), The Defence of the Roman and Byzantine East. Proceedings of a Colloquium held at the University of Sheffield in April 1986. Part i = BAR International Series. 297 (i) (Oxford, 1986) pp. 109-225, 1 carte, 1 tabl.
